Flow.description: Review and update multiple service appointments

loops.name: loop_through_selected_change_tech_records
loops.label: loop through selected change tech records

fields.name: SAGuidanceText_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Select the Service Appointments where you would like to change the Service Resource. On the next screen you will be prompted for the new Service Resource.

value.stringValue: AppointmentNumber:95, MR_Service_Resource__c:95, Status:95, SchedStartTime:95, Duration:95, DurationType:95, SchedEndTime:95, EarliestStartTime:95, DueDate:95

fields.name: SAGuidanceText_0_0
fields.fieldText: Select the Service Appointments you would like to delete and then press the Next button to delete them.

value.stringValue: AppointmentNumber:95, MR_Service_Resource__c:95, Status:95, SchedStartTime:95, Duration:95, DurationType:95, SchedEndTime:95, EarliestStartTime:95, DueDate:95

fields.name: Error1Text
fields.fieldText: Error, you have entered 1 more values that are invalid. Most likely you have entered a value for duration that is negative or greater than 24 hours.

fields.name: MTS
fields.fieldText: Multi Technician Scheduling

fields.name: Confirmation
fields.fieldText:
Success!

The assignments are being created. This process may take a minute or 2. Please refresh your screen to review the new service appointments.

fields.name: MTS_0
fields.fieldText: Multi Technician Scheduling

fields.name: Confirmation_0
fields.fieldText:
Error!

An error was encountered please try again or contact your administrator.

fields.name: SorryNoTechsFound
fields.fieldText: Sorry, no technicians were found in the selected Territory with the selected Skill. Please change search criteria and try again.

value.stringValue: MemberNumber:159, MR_Resource_Name__c:159, TerritoryType:159, MR_Service_Territory__c:159, EffectiveStartDate:159, EffectiveEndDate:159

fields.name: TooManyText
fields.fieldText:
Error, too many service appointments would be created. Please reduce the number of days and/or Service Resources and try again.


Max number of Service Appointments: {!constLimitSAs}

Number you are trying to create: {!numSAs}

screens.name: Update_SAs_or_Take_Other_Action_Screen
screens.label: Update SAs or Take Other Action

fields.name: SAGuidanceText_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Edit the values for columns.


You must press the Next button actually save the changes.


Or Select the action you would like to take. On the next screen the service appointments will be listed and you can select which ones you want to take action on.

value.stringValue: AppointmentNumber:95, MR_Service_Resource__c:95, Status:95, SchedStartTime:95, Duration:95, DurationType:95, SchedEndTime:95, EarliestStartTime:95, DueDate:95

fields.name: CSRText
fields.fieldText: Press Next to select the Service Appointments that you want to re-assign to another Service Resource.

fields.name: DSAText
fields.fieldText: Press Next to select the Service Appointments that you want to delete.
